text: "Another Part of Me" is a song by American singer and songwriter Michael Jackson. It was in Jackson's 1986 3-D film Captain EO. It was released as the sixth single from Jackson's seventh album Bad on July 11, 1988. "Another Part of Me" was not going to be on Bad. But after Jackson's manager Frank DiLeo danced along to the song, it was decided that the song would be featured on the album.Bad 25 The song reached number eleven in the Billboard Hot 100. ==References== Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:1988 songs
title: Another Part of Me
